actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries

official_title: To repeal the Western Area Power Administration borrowing authority, and for other purposes.
short_title: American Taxpayer and Western Area Power Administration Customer Protection Act of 2017

summary.text:
American Taxpayer and Western Area Power Administration Customer Protection Act of 2017

This bill amends the Hoover Power Plant Act of 1984 to repeal the Western Area Power Administration's borrowing authority.It does not apply to any projects in execution on or before October 30, 2017, or any projects approved before September 15, 2018.

titles.title: American Taxpayer and Western Area Power Administration Customer Protection Act of 2017
American Taxpayer and Western Area Power Administration Customer Protection Act of 2017
To repeal the Western Area Power Administration borrowing authority, and for other purposes.
